ModMetaData.name: Flak Dusters
ModMetaData.author: VerriganHolmes
ModMetaData.description: Adds a flak duster that combines the protection of flak armor with the coverage and style of a long coat. Includes updated textures based on "Retextured Apparel" and optional integration with Anthitei's style framework and style packs when those mods are loaded. Supports RimWorld versions 1.0 through 1.6.
